name: SyntheMed
overview: SyntheMed, Inc. is a biomaterials company engaged in the development and commercialization of medical devices for therapeutic applications. The Companyâ€™s products and product candidates, all of which are based on its, bioresorbable polymer technology, are primarily surgical implants designed to prevent or reduce the formation of adhesions (scar tissue) following a range of surgical procedures. Its product, REPEL-CV Bioresorbable Adhesion Barrier (REPEL-CV), is a bioresorbable film designed to be placed over the surface of the heart at the conclusion of cardiac surgery to reduce the formation of post-operative adhesions. In March 2009, the Company obtained clearance from the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for selling REPEL-CV domestically.
